markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Web Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=2774) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Through the careful cultivation of highly sensitive hairs, you've developed the ability to sense creatures without seeing them. You gain imprecise [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) at a range of 15 feet. When you and a creature are both touching the same anchored, threadlike object (such as a rope, webbing, or wire), your imprecise tremorsense can sense that creature at a range of 60 feet.
name: Web Hunter
